definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: This kind of machine is suitable for thermoforming fabric cups by bullet head moulds.
sentences.chinese: 該機適用於各種布料，子彈頭模具的熱壓定型。

sentences.english: The hero of LittleBigPlanet is a tiny person made out of some kind of coarse-textured fabric.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲的英雄是一個像是某種粗糙布料製作的小人。

sentences.english: Attached Colliders' objects must intersect with the cloth you are attaching to.
sentences.chinese: 注意，被附着的碰撞體必須與布料有相交。

sentences.english: Silk fabrics are shinier, more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 絲質布料比較有光澤，比較貴。

sentences.english: Can use in the billfold , woof, paperboard & book.
sentences.chinese: 可用於皮夾，布料，厚紙，書類。

sentences.english: They promise that the material won't shrink in the wash. ( v. become smaller because of moisture or heat or cold)
sentences.chinese: 他們承諾這種布料洗後不縮水。

sentences.english: Some laundries can't be washed due to the cloth materials.
sentences.chinese: 也有因布料原因而不能進行洗滌的衣物。

sentences.english: No puckering or stretching of fabric when zipper is inserted.
sentences.chinese: 當拉鍊裝上後布料外觀不能起皺或拉長。

sentences.english: This undershirt is made of thin fabric.
sentences.chinese: 這件汗衫是薄布料製成的。

sentences.english: She has jewelry made from shells and rolls of the country's traditional Kente cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她還出售用貝殼製作的珠寶和迦納傳統的彩色布料。

sentences.english: Khaki is a durable fabric that is widely used for uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布是很耐久的布料，廣泛用來製作制服。

sentences.english: The clothes she weaves, and dyes are very exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 她織染的布料相當精美。

sentences.english: I brought the garden chairs in from outside and wrapped some fabric on the seats.
sentences.chinese: 我把花園椅從室外搬到了室內，又在座位上包了布料。

sentences.english: They were going to export cloth, or become a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他們準備出口布料或者想成爲飛行員。

sentences.english: Cloth treated on one side with a drying oil or synthetic resin.
sentences.chinese: 一邊用烘乾油或合成樹脂處理過的布料。

sentences.english: On one side , it can avoid wet cloth imbalance which make the product of good-denisty and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 避免溼料布料不均現象，產品密實度好，質量高。
